title: Delegation
brief_description: Aims to provide all levels of management with skills and knowledge to be able to effectively delegate. The program looks at the definition and benefits of delegation, barriers to effective delegation, ascertaining which tasks can and cannot be delegated, setting goals and choosing the best person for the job. A manual accompanies the video and may be borrowed as a separate loan item.
